item.title: Inital Notes Email
item.description:
"Josh Santos" <josh@omnidapps.com> 

List of expertise areas:

  - Desire and love for making positive change
    - Through learning as a means with concrete examples
    - Technology and life balance
      - Potentially could piggy back off of Alex's idea if he is open to it
        - He could discuss more with us if he would like
        - Involves safety application development
  - Desire and love for other people
    - Sometimes to a fault, empathic abilities tend to be helpful when tuned properly (life balance side)
    - Love for butterflies! See XKCD :)
  - DevOps automation
  - Code code code :)
  - Enthusiasm for learning container based applications
    - Simple deployments
  - Enthusiasm for learning new technologies (keeping in mind FOSS/non-profit)
  - Should I go on :)?

Best Regards,
Josh Santos
Lover of tech, mankind, and all the things!

- Let's make great things :-)
